name: Notion Habit Tracker
description: Get a new habit in 30 days.Notion Habit tracker is a productivity tool that helps you develop and maintain good habits over a period of 30 days. It allows you to track your daily habits and monitor your progress as you work towards your goals.InformationTo use the habit tracker, you first create a list of the habits you want to focus on for the next 30 days. These habits could be anything from exercising regularly to reading a book each day. You can customize the habit tracker to fit your needs
